XXasycsaru:0: Śag_1.1 pāpaṃ na kuryān manasā na vācā kāyena vā kiṃcana sarvaloke /
XXasycsaru:1: riktaḥ kāmaiḥ smṛtimān saṃprajānaṃ duḥkhaṃ na seveta anarthasaṃhitam //
XXasycsaru:4: Śag_2.2 ākhyeyaṃ tu parijñāya ākhyātāraṃ na manyate /
XXasycsaru:5: tad vai na vidyate tasya vadeyur yena taṃ pare //
XXasycsaru:6: Śag_2.3 samo viśeṣa uta vāpi hīno yo manyate sa vivadeta tena /
XXasycsaru:7: vidhātraye 'smin na vikampate yaḥ samo viśiṣṭaś ca na tasya bhavati //
XXasycsaru:8: ācchidya tṛṣṇām iha nāmarūpe prahāya mānaṃ ca na saṃgam eti /
XXasycsaru:9: Śag_2.4 taṃ śāntadhūmam anighaṃ nirāśaṃ nādrākṣus te devamanuṣyaloke /
XXasycsaru:12: aṃga me gautama brūhi śāntiṃ tvam anukaṃpayā //
XXasycsaru:13: Śag_3.2 viparyāsena saṃjñānāṃ cittaṃ te paridahyate /
XXasycsaru:15: Śag_3.3 aśubhāṃ bhāvaya sadā tvam ekāgraḥ susamāhitaḥ /
XXasycsaru:16: nirvāpayāśu rāgāgniṃ dahyase mā punaḥ punaḥ //
XXasycsaru:22: Śag_4.1 kathaṃvihārabahulo bhikṣuḥ pañcaughatīrṇas taratīha ṣaṣṭhaṃ /
XXasycsaru:23: kathaṃdhyāyī vipulāṃ kāmatṛṣṇāṃ tīrṇo bhavaty apratilabdhayoktraḥ //
XXasycsaru:24: Śag_4.2 praśrabdhakāyaḥ suvimuktacitto hy asaṃskurvan smṛtimān akopyaḥ
XXasycsaru:26: Śag_4.3 evaṃvihārabahulo bhikṣuḥ pañcaughatīrṇas taratīha ṣaṣṭhaṃ /
XXasycsaru:27: evaṃdhyāyī vipulāṃ kāmatṛṣṇāṃ tīrṇo bhavaty apratilabdhayoktraḥ //
XXasycsaru:28: nityotrasto hy ayaṃ loko nityodvignā iyaṃ prajā /
XXasycsaru:29: Śag_5.1 anutpanneṣu duḥkheṣu samutpanneṣu vā punaḥ /
XXasycsaru:30: yadi kiṃcid anutrastaṃ pṛṣṭa ācakṣva tan mama //
XXasycsaru:33: Śag_5.3 cirasya bata paśyāmi brāhmaṇaṃ parinirvṛtaṃ /
XXasycsaru:35: Śag_6.1 kenābhivarṇā janatā praṇītā mārgaś ca nairyāṇikataḥ prayuktaḥ /
XXasycsaru:36: kutra sthitaḥ kutra ca śikṣamāṇo nāyaṃ martyaḥ paralokād bibheti //
XXasycsaru:37: Śag_6.2 yaḥ śīlavāñ jñānavān bhāvitātmā samāhitaḥ smṛtimān ṛjugataś ca /
XXasycsaru:38: sarve 'sya śokajvarathāḥ prahīṇāḥ samyaksmṛto yasya cittaṃ vimuktaṃ //
XXasycsaru:39: Śag_6.3 tenābhivarṇā janatā praṇītā mārgaś ca nairyāṇikataḥ prayuktaḥ /
XXasycsaru:40: atra sthitaḥ atra ca śikṣamāṇo nāyaṃ martyaḥ paralokād bibheti //
XXasycsaru:41: Śag_7.1 kathaṃ yaśasvī bhavati kathaṃ bhavati bhogavān /
XXasycsaru:42: kathaṃ kīrtim avāpnoti kathaṃ mitrāṇi vindati //
XXasycsaru:43: Śag_7.2 śīlād yaśasvī bhavati dānād bhavati bhogavān /
XXasycsaru:44: satyena kīrtim āpnoti dadan mitrāṇi vindati //
XXasycsaru:45: Śag_8.1 kutaḥ sarā nivartante kutra vartma na vartate /
XXasycsaru:47: Śag_8.2 cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ tathā ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo manas tathā /
XXasycsaru:48: yatra nāma ca rūpaṃ ca niḥśeṣam uparuhyate //
XXasycsaru:49: Śag_8.3 tataḥ sarā nivartante tatra vartma na vartate /
XXasycsaru:51: Śag_9.1 kena svid oghaṃ tarati kenottarati cārṇavaṃ /
XXasycsaru:52: duḥkhaṃ tyajati kena svit kena svit pariśudhyati //
XXasycsaru:53: Śag_9.2 śraddhayā tarati hy ogham apramādena cārṇavaṃ /
XXasycsaru:55: Śag_10.1 ka etam oghaṃ tarati rātriṃdivam atandritaḥ /
XXasycsaru:56: anālambe 'pratiṣṭhe ca ko gaṃbhīre na sīdati //
XXasycsaru:60: anālambe 'pratiṣṭhe ca sa gaṃbhīre na sīdati //
XXasycsaru:61: Śag_11.1 rāgadveṣau bhagavan kinnidānāv aratiratī romaharṣaḥ kuto 'yam /
XXasycsaru:62: kutaḥsamutthāś ca mano vitarkāḥ kumārakā dhātrīm ivāśrayante //
XXasycsaru:64: pṛthagviṣaktāḥ kāmeṣu mālutā vā latā vane //
XXasycsaru:65: Śag_11.3 rāgaś ca dveṣaś ca itonidānāv aratiratī romaharṣaḥ ito 'yaṃ /
XXasycsaru:66: itaḥsamutthāś ca mano vitarkāḥ kumārakā dhātrīm ivāśrayante //
XXasycsaru:67: Śag_11.4 ye tān prajānanti yatonidānāṃs te tāṃ janā yakṣa vinodayanti /
XXasycsaru:69: Śag_12.1 kāryam etad brāhmaṇena prahāṇam akilāsinā /
XXasycsaru:70: kāmānāṃ viprahāṇārthaṃ na hi kāṃkṣaty asau bhavaṃ //
XXasycsaru:71: Śag_12.2 sa kāryaṃ brāhmaṇasyāsti kṛtārtho brāhmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ //
XXasycsaru:72: Śag_12.3 yāvan na gādhaṃ labhate na tīram āyūhate sarvagātraiḥ sa tāvat /
XXasycsaru:73: tīraṃ tu labdhveha saṃtiṣṭhati sthale nāyūhate pāragato nirucyate //
XXasycsaru:74: Śag_12.4 eṣopamā dāmale brāhmaṇasya kṣīṇāsravo yo nipako dhyānalābhī /
XXasycsaru:75: sarve 'sya śokajvarathāḥ prahīṇāḥ samyaksmṛto yasya cittaṃ vimuktam //
XXasycsaru:81: Śag_13 yathā kathaṃ tvaṃ bhikṣo anālambe apratiṣṭhe ogham atārṣīḥ /
XXasycsaru:82: yathā yathāhaṃ devate āyūhāmi tathā tathā saṃsīdāmi /
XXasycsaru:83: yathā yathā saṃsīdāmi tathā tathā saṃtiṣṭhe /
XXasycsaru:84: yathā yathā saṃtiṣṭhe tathā tathā uhye /
XXasycsaru:85: yathā yathāhaṃ devate nāyūhāmi tathā tathā na saṃsīdāmīti vistareṇa śuklapakṣo veditavyaḥ //
XXasycsaru:87: eko 'raṇye prasṛto dhyāyase tvaṃ vittād vihīna uta vā prārthayānaḥ /
XXasycsaru:88: Śag_14.1 grāmasya vā kiṃcanāgo nv akārṣīḥ kasmāj janena na karoṣi sakhyaṃ
XXasycsaru:89: sakhyaṃ na saṃvidyate kena cit tava //
XXasycsaru:90: Śag_14.2 arthāprāptyā hṛdayasyeha śāntir jitveha senāṃ priyaśātarūpaṃ /
XXasycsaru:91: eko dhyāyī sukham asmy anvabhotsaṃ tasmād janena na karomi sakhyaṃ
XXasycsaru:92: sakhyaṃ na saṃvidyate kena cid mama //
XXasycsaru:94: utpadya hi nirudhyante teṣāṃ vyupaśamaḥ sukham //
XXasycsaru:96: apramattā na mriyante pramattās tu sadā mṛtāḥ //
XXasycsaru:98: bhūyas tṛṣṇā vivardhate sā gāḍhīkurute 'sya bandhanaṃ //
XXasycsaru:100: ātmanaḥ priyakartāraṃ taṃ janaḥ kurute priyaṃ //
XXasycsaru:101: Śag_19 yat pareṣūpanidhyāyet karma dṛṣṭveha pāpakam /
XXasycsaru:102: ātmanā tan na kurvīta karmabaddho hi pāpakaḥ //
XXasycsaru:103: Śag_20 subhāṣitaṃ hy uttamam āhur āryāḥ priyaṃ vaden nāpriyaṃ tad dvitīyaṃ /
XXasycsaru:104: satyaṃ vaden nānṛtaṃ tat tṛtīyaṃ dharmaṃ vaden nādharmaṃ tat caturtham //
XXasycsaru:105: Śag_21 śraddhātha hrīḥ śīlam athāpi dānaṃ dharmā ime satpuruṣapraśastāḥ /
XXasycsaru:106: etaṃ hi mārgaṃ divigaṃ vadanti etena vai gacchati devalokam //
XXasycsaru:107: Śag_22 śrutvā dharmaṃ vijānāti śrutvā pāpān nivartate /
XXasycsaru:108: śrutvā anarthaṃ tyajati śrutvā prāpnoti nirvṛtim //
XXasycsaru:109: Śag_23 ākāśasamo na lipyate indrakīlapratimo na kaṃpate /
XXasycsaru:110: hrada iva samupetakardame saṃsāre ramate na paṇḍitaḥ //
XXasycsaru:111: Śag_24.1 ye rūpeṇa pramiṇvanti māṃ ghoṣeṇānuyānti ca /
XXasycsaru:112: cchandarāgavaśopetā na mā jānanti te janāḥ //
XXasycsaru:113: Śag_24.2 adhyātmaṃ ca vijānāti bahirdhā ca na paśyati /
XXasycsaru:114: adhyātmaphaladarśī yaḥ sa vai ghoṣeṇa nīyate //
XXasycsaru:115: Śag_24.3 adhyātmaṃ ca na jānāti bahirdhā ca vipaśyati /
XXasycsaru:117: Śag_24.4 adhyātmaṃ ca na jānāti bahirdhā ca na paśyati /
XXasycsaru:119: Śag_24.5 adhyātmaṃ ca vijānāti bahirdhā ca vipaśyati /
XXasycsaru:120: dhīro niḥsaraṇaprajño na sa ghoṣeṇa nīyate //
XXasycsaru:121: Śag_25 ṣaṣṭhe adhipatau rājñi rajyamāne rajasvalaḥ /
XXasycsaru:122: arajasy arajā bhavati rakto bālo nirucyate //
XXasycsaru:124: yatra rāgaś ca dveṣaś ca māno mrakṣaś ca gāhate //
XXasycsaru:125: Śag_27 kūrmaḥ svake 'ṅgāni yathā kapāle bhikṣur nidadhyān manaso vitarkāni /
XXasycsaru:126: aniśrito 'nyān aviheṭhamānaḥ parinirvṛto nāpavadeta kaṃ cit //
XXasycsaru:127: Śag_28 tulyam atulyaṃ ca saṃbhavaṃ bhavasaṃskāram avāsṛjan muniḥ /
XXasycsaru:129: Śag_29 nāsti kāmasamaḥ paṃko nāsti dveṣasamo grahaḥ /
XXasycsaru:130: nāsti mohasamaṃ jālaṃ nāsti tṛṣṇāsamā nadī //
XXasycsaru:131: Śag_30 ākāśe vai padaṃ nāsti śramaṇo nāsti bāhyakaḥ /
XXasycsaru:133: Śag_31 sthitiḥ prapaṃcāś ca na santi yasya yaḥ saṃdānaṃ parighaṃ cātivṛttaḥ /
XXasycsaru:134: taṃ nistṛṣṇaṃ muniṃ carantaṃ na vijānāti sadevako 'pi lokaḥ //
XXasycsaru:135: Śag_32 yasya vitarkā vidhūpitā adhyātmam avikalpitā aśeṣaṃ /
XXasycsaru:136: saṃgaṃ so 'tītya rūpasaṃjñāṃ caturyogāpagato na jātim eti //
XXasycsaru:137: Śag_33 dadataḥ puṇyaṃ pravardhate vairaṃ saṃyamato na cīyate /
XXasycsaru:138: kuśalī prajahāti pāpakaṃ kleśānāṃ kṣayatas tu nirvṛtaḥ //
XXasycsaru:142: cittasya dāmanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham //
XXasycsaru:143: Śag_36 cittanimittasya kovidaḥ pravivekasya ca vindate rasaṃ /
XXasycsaru:144: dhyāyī nipakaḥ pratismṛto bhuṃkte prītisukhaṃ nirāmiṣaṃ //
XXasycsaru:145: Śag_37 aśilpajīvī laghur ātmakāmo jitendriyaḥ sarvato vipramuktaḥ /
XXasycsaru:146: anokasārī hy amamo nirāśaḥ kāmān prahāyaikacaro yas sa bhikṣuḥ //
XXasycsaru:148: damayati durdamaṃ cittaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ taṃ bravīmy ahaṃ //
XXasycsaru:150: Śag_39.1 kenāyaṃ nivṛto lokaḥ kenāyaṃ na prakāśate /
XXasycsaru:151: kiṃ cābhilepanaṃ brūṣe kiṃ ca tasya mahad bhayam //
XXasycsaru:152: Śag_39.2 avidyānivṛto lokaḥ pramādān na prakāśate /
XXasycsaru:153: jalpābhilepanaṃ brūmi duḥkhaṃ tasya mahad bhayaṃ //
XXasycsaru:154: Śag_39.3 sravanti sarvataḥ srotāḥ srotasāṃ kiṃ nivāraṇaṃ /
XXasycsaru:155: srotasāṃ saṃvaraṃ brūhi kena srotaḥ pidhīyate //
XXasycsaru:156: Śag_39.4 yāni srotāṃsi lokasya smṛtiḥ teṣāṃ nivāraṇaṃ /
XXasycsaru:157: srotasāṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmi prajñayā hi pidhīyate //
XXasycsaru:158: Śag_39.5 prajñāyāś ca smṛteś caiva nāmarūpasya sarvaśaḥ /
XXasycsaru:159: ācakṣva pṛṣṭa etan me kutraitad uparudhyate //
XXasycsaru:160: Śag_39.6 prajñā caiva smṛtiś caiva nāmarūpaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ /
XXasycsaru:162: Śag_39.7 kathaṃ smṛtasya carato vijñānam uparudhyate /
XXasycsaru:163: ācakṣva pṛṣṭa etan me yathātatham asaṃśayaḥ //
XXasycsaru:164: Śag_39.8 adhyātaṃ ca bahirdhā ca vedanāṃ nābhinandataḥ /
XXasycsaru:166: Śag_39.9 ye ca saṃkhyātadharmāṇo ye ca śaikṣāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ /
XXasycsaru:167: teṣāṃ me nipakasyeryāṃ pṛṣṭaḥ prabrūhi mārṣa //
XXasycsaru:171: Śag_40.1 kāmān kāmāyamānasya tasya cet tat samṛdhyati /
XXasycsaru:172: addhā prītamanā bhavati labdhvā martyo yad īpsitaṃ //
XXasycsaru:173: Śag_40.2 tasya cet kāmāyamānasya chandajātasya jaṃtunaḥ /
XXasycsaru:174: te kāmāḥ parihīyaṃte śalyaviddha iva rūpyate //
XXasycsaru:175: Śag_40.3 yaḥ kāmāṃ parivarjayati sarpasyeva śirāt padaṃ /
XXasycsaru:176: sa imāṃ viṣaktikāṃ loke smṛtaḥ samativartate //
XXasycsaru:178: striyo dāsān pṛthakkāmān yo naro hy abhigṛdhyati //
XXasycsaru:179: Śag_40.5 abalaṃ vā balīyāṃso mṛdnaṃty enaṃ parisravāḥ /
XXasycsaru:180: tata enaṃ duḥkham anveti bhinnāṃ nāvam ivodakaṃ //
XXasycsaru:181: yasya tv etat samucchinnaṃ tālamastakavad dhataṃ /
XXasycsaru:182: śokās tasya nivartante udabindur iva puṣkarāt // Śag_40.6 (cf. Uv 10.13ab und 3.10cd)
XXasycsaru:185: Śag_41.1 pratyutpannāś ca ye dharmās tatra tatra vipaśyakaḥ /
